string-array.name: attraction_description_short
string-array.item: Anand Bhavan is the place where Jawaharlal Nehru lived.
Allahabad Fort was built by Akbar.
Alfred Park is a very famous park in Allahabad.
The Allahabad Museum is a national-level museum.
A water park to enjoy in summers.
Built by the Mughal Emperor Akbar.
Triveni Sangam is the place where all the three rivers meet(Ganga,Yamuna,Saraswati).

string-array.name: attraction_description_long
string-array.item: The Anand Bhavan is a historic house museum in Allahabad, India focusing on the Nehru Family. It was constructed by Indian political leader Motilal Nehru in the 1930s to serve as the residence of the Nehru family when the original mansion Swaraj Bhavan (previously called Anand Bhavan) was transformed into the local headquarters of the Indian National Congress.Anand Bhavan was donated to Indian government in 1970 by the then Prime Minister Indira Gandhi, the granddaughter of Motilal Nehru and daughter of Jawaharlal Nehru.

Allahabad Fort is a fort built by the Mughal emperor Akbar at Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India in 1583. The fort stands on the banks of the Yamuna near its confluence with the river Ganges. It is recognised by the Archaeological Survey of India as a monument of national importance.

Chandrasekhar Azad Park (British colonial era Alfred Park and informally Company Bagh) is a public park in Allahabad. Built in 1870 to mark Prince Alfred visit to the city, with an area of 133 acres, it is the biggest park in Allahabad. It was renamed after freedom fighter Chandra Shekhar Azad, who sacrificed his life here, during the Indian independence struggle in 1931. Originally and still famously the park is known as Alfred Park.

The Allahabad Museum is a national-level museum in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh. Established in 1931, it is known for its rich collection and unique objects of art, and is funded by Ministry of Culture. Moreover, it is a premier research centre for archaeologists, historians and academicians and carries out extensive research activities and publications in archaeology, art and literature. Its rock art gallery has the largest collection of prehistoric paintings displayed in India dating from 14,000 B.C to 2000 B.C. The museum, using solar power system, has become the first museum in the country to become self-reliant in power generation.

As the name suggests, Fun Gaon Water Park in Allahabad is a fun-filled place to be in. Literally meaning “A village of Fun” – Fun Gaon is situated on Kaushambi Road in Allahabad. It is a popular water, amusement park of Allahabad and is a fun place for people of all age groups. So, it has something to offer for every visitor. The water at this park is quite clean, and thus the quality and cleanliness attracts huge number of visitors.

The Jawahar Planetarium is located in the city of Allahabad in Uttar Pradesh, India. It was built in 1979 and is situated beside Anand Bhavan the former residence of the Nehru-Gandhi family and now a museum. It is managed by the Jawaharlal Nehru Memorial Fund (estb. 1964), which has its headquarters at Teen Murti House, New Delhi. Each year, the prestigious Jawaharlal Nehru Memorial Lecture is also held at the planetarium, organised under the auspices of Jawaharlal Nehru Memorial Fund on the birth anniversary of Indias first prime minister, November 14.

"Within this underground temple, inside the fort, lies the Akshaya Vat - or the immortal tree."Believed to have been visited by Lord Rama, the temple was also seen by the famous Chinese traveler and writer Hiuen Tsang during his visit to this place.

In Hindu tradition Triveni Sangam is the "confluence" of three rivers. Sangama is the Sanskrit word for confluence. The point of confluence is a sacred place for Hindus. A bath here is said to flush away all of ones sins and free one from the cycle of rebirth.

string-array.name: activities_short_desc
string-array.item: You will get to feel like a bird.

string-array.name: activities_what
string-array.item: • Parachute riding is getting feel like flying in the sky like a bird with the help of a paramotor.\n • You will get a magnificient view from such a height .\n • You can also enjoy other activities like Burma Bridge and Pool Table along with cake cutting

• A pool table is also present in the premises.
 • All participants are given a 5 minute briefing before entering the circuit.
 • Free wi-fi.
 • One-of-a-kind indoor circuit.
 • Shoe racks and lockers are available for the customers.
 • Sky Karting offers a world-class racing track by a Spain and Germany based firm Protex Karting.
 • The go-karting circuit has a brew-pub right below it.
• A unique mode of exploring historic buildings, monuments and memorials.\n • Safety gear and trained instructors.\n

• Enjoy a fun-filled camping session with various games and activities for 8 hours in Allahabad.
 • The camp is ideal for those who want to spend a delightful time with a group of friends or family.
 • This 8 hour camp also includes lunch and evening tea with snacks.

• Bowling Shoes and Socks are compulsory on the lanes. Shoe Rental: Rs.30/Per Game, Socks: Rs.40 to be paid directly to the merchant.
 • Play the game of bowling in a UV light experience.
 • Play the game on amazing UV lit Michael Jackson, Marilyn Monroe, Elvis Presley and Evil Knievel bowling lanes.

• GA safety guidelines and training session takes place before each round of skating.
 • A souvenir shop for photographs, T-shirts, etc. is available.
 • Children are provided warm clothing if they feel too cold.
 • Lockers and changing room facilities are available.
 • Professional guides are available at all times.
 • Professional medical assistance is available at all times.
 • Socks are on sale in case one feels too cold.
 • The key attractions are a natural ice rink, an in-house DJ, sound and light audio systems.
 • There is a fully operational bar and food station available.
 • iSKATE is Indias first natural ice skating rink and café.

• Enjoy the scenic beauty of the place while doing this activity.
 • Enjoy this adventure with your family and friends along with a expert guide.
 • Relax after a tiring day in the tents provided by the company.

string-array.name: restaurant_description_long
string-array.item: A quiet good restaurant in the city. Cards are accepted here and a pre order are easily available here. There are several fast food chains to have here.
A quiet good restaurant in the city. Cards are accepted here and a pre order are easily available here. There are several fast food chains to have here.
